answers.answer: Do you know where your placenta is?I'm on my second and did not feel baby til the 20th week. When I had my 20 week scan, they told me my placenta was across the front :)
Also, try lying in different positions in the evening and really focus on your tummy.

I havent had and ultra sound yet my 19week is coming up . Im just nervous cause my first child I had got preeclampsia so I had a emergency csection at 33weeks this pregnancy they consider me highrisk so im like so nervous
I wouldn't worry.  I'm 16 weeks with my second aswell. I'm sure you well feel the baby soon enough.

question: Im on my second child and im really nervous im 17 weeks I havent felt anymovement and also im having trounle breathing wonder if it could just be aniexty.
